description:
Thanks to the « GEO 50 unforgettable destination » app, discover 50 extraordinary destinations all around the world!

Explore exceptional landscapes, people and cities! Just travel all over the 3D globe thanks to a simple tap. The Earth is between your fingers!

Find all the 50 destinations classified in 4 main categories: 
-	The nature adventure: from Ethiopia to Peru, Turkey, Costa Rica…
-	The dream islands : New Caledonia, Thailand, The Grenadines…all the most beautiful islands for you
-	The unkonw people: discover the Chipayas of Bolivia, the Nennets from Russia or the Badjos of Indonesia…
-	The trendy cities: Odssa, Neuquén, Oaxaca…the most incredible cities of the world

Each destination is enriched with exclusive content: videos, photos, guides, practical information, maps…

Discover also more than 5 000 photos from the GEO community!
